Type.Name: Grab

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grab extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Grab methods allow you to limit the keyboard and mouse interaction to a particular widget or window.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig void Add(class Gtk.Widget widget) cil managed

Docs.param: The that grabs keyboard and pointer events.
Docs.summary: Makes the specified widget the currently grabbed widget. This means that interaction with other widgets in the same application is blocked and mouse as well as keyboard events are delivered to this widget.
Queries the current grab of the default window group.
Docs.value: A which currently has the grab or if no grab is active.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Remove(class Gtk.Widget widget) cil managed

Docs.param: The which gives up the grab.
Docs.summary: Removes the grab from the given widget. You have to pair calls to and .
